mods.abstract: Mr. and Mrs. Louis Bailey Audigier of Knoxville at Great Sphinx at Gizeh; Mr. and Mrs. Audigier and one other man on camels with four Egyptian guides pose for picture before three quarter view of Great Sphinx and the Pyramid of Khufu, ca. 2560-2540 B.C.E. (background); "GEORGE M. GEORGOULAS PYRAMIDS CAIRO" in black ink stamped on back of print, bottom left corner.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
